description: Review PR #3 code quality. Run typecheck and lint. Fix any issues found. Ensure all new components render properly and handle edge cases.

userStories.title: Run quality checks and fix failures
userStories.description: Run bun run typecheck and bun run lint. Fix any failures. Check for unused imports, dead code, missing types, any build errors.

userStories.title: Review dashboard components for correctness
userStories.description: Review trend detection logic, chart rendering, comparison view. Check for: division by zero in stats, empty state handling, null data handling, date edge cases. Fix anything found.

userStories.title: Review API endpoints and data flow
userStories.description: Review weekly summary generation, trend API. Check for: proper error handling, Supabase query efficiency, rate limiting on AI calls, proper response types. Fix anything found.
